citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 on March 3,
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and email. The licensee called back and
informed the inspector that he had reached out via email 6 months ago to the previous inspector to inform the program
that all regulated species were sold from the facility and no regulated activity was occurring. Next steps were discussed
on the call.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 on March 3, 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and email. The licensee called back and 
informed the inspector that he had reached out via email 6 months ago to the previous inspector to inform the program 
that all regulated species were sold from the facility and no regulated activity was occurring. Next steps were discussed 
on the call.  
 
 Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
